mapper.insert: insert into oa_notice_person (fid, fognid, fognname, forgid, forgname, fcreateid, fcreatename, fcreatedatetime, fpersonid, fpersonname, freaddate, fpersonfname, fmainid, fbrowse, fdeptname, fdeptid, version) values (#{fid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fognid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fognname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{forgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{forgname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fcreateid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fcreatename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fcreatedatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fpersonid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fpersonname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{freaddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fpersonfname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fmainid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fbrowse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fdeptname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fdeptid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update oa_notice_person set fognid = #{fognid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fognname = #{fognname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, forgid = #{forgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, forgname = #{forgname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fcreateid = #{fcreateid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fcreatename = #{fcreatename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fcreatedatetime = #{fcreatedatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, fpersonid = #{fpersonid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fpersonname = #{fpersonname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, freaddate = #{freaddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, fpersonfname = #{fpersonfname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fmainid = #{fmainid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fbrowse = #{fbrowse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fdeptname = #{fdeptname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fdeptid = #{fdeptid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER} where fid = #{fid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select fid, fognid, fognname, forgid, forgname, fcreateid, fcreatename, fcreatedatetime, fpersonid, fpersonname, freaddate, fpersonfname, fmainid, fbrowse, fdeptname, fdeptid, version from oa_notice_person where fid = #{fid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select fid, fognid, fognname, forgid, forgname, fcreateid, fcreatename, fcreatedatetime, fpersonid, fpersonname, freaddate, fpersonfname, fmainid, fbrowse, fdeptname, fdeptid, version from oa_notice_person order by fcreatedatetime desc

select fid, fognid, fognname, forgid, forgname, fcreateid, fcreatename, fcreatedatetime, fpersonid, fpersonname, freaddate, fpersonfname, fmainid, fbrowse, fdeptname, fdeptid, version from oa_notice_person where fmainid = #{fmainid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by fcreatedatetime desc

select fid, fognid, fognname, forgid, forgname, fcreateid, fcreatename, fcreatedatetime, fpersonid, fpersonname, freaddate, fpersonfname, fmainid, fbrowse, fdeptname, fdeptid, version from oa_notice_person where fmainid = #{fmainid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and fpersonid = #{fpersonid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by fcreatedatetime desc
